title: How to Crochet a Cuddle Mat for Cats

steps.headline: Note that this mat is worked holding three strands of yarn together throughout.
Row 1.
steps.description: Sc in 2nd ch from hook and ea ch across. 36 sc.

steps.headline: Row 2.
steps.description: Ch 1; turn. Sc in front loop of ea sc across.

steps.headline: Row 3.
steps.description: Ch 1; turn. Sc in ea sc across.

steps.headline: Row 48.
steps.description: Repeat row 2. Finish off, leaving at least a 6-inch tail to weave in to prevent unraveling.

steps.headline: Crochet the edging.
steps.description: Attach a single strand of yarn in any sc along the edge. Ch 1; work one sc in each sc and end rows around mat. Join in sl st to 1st sc; finish off, leaving a 6-inch tail. Weave in all ends.

text: Note that this mat is worked holding three strands of yarn together throughout.  Start crocheting: Chain 37  Row 1. Sc in 2nd ch from hook and ea ch across. 36 sc. Row 2. Ch 1; turn. Sc in front loop of ea sc across. Row 3. Ch 1; turn. Sc in ea sc across. Rows 4 - 47. Repeat rows 2 & 3. Row 48. Repeat row 2. Finish off, leaving at least a 6-inch tail to weave in to prevent unraveling. Crochet the edging. Attach a single strand of yarn in any sc along the edge. Ch 1; work one sc in each sc and end rows around mat. Join in sl st to 1st sc; finish off, leaving a 6-inch tail. Weave in all ends. Finished.
